column1: 02. Front Elevation
03. Mud Map
04. Video captured of scope of works/pre-start
05. Correct use of available technology e.g. moisture meter/thermal camera
06. Photos clearly labelled
07. Appropriate number and quality of photos per affected location
08. Pre-existing defects and damage not related to the claimed event accurately captured and labelled
11. Occupant/Insured details of event accurately captured - How, When, What
12. Builders Observations accurately recorded
13. Primary Causation accurately recorded
14. Builders Conclusion - clear, concise, correct policy response, correct referral determination
15. Report Details - Asbestos, Owner Maintenance and Defects, Accomodation - accurately filled out
16. Clear return note to Submissions team
17. Assesment responds correctly to PDS requirements i.e. Open Plan areas, Matching, exploratory works
20. Overall measurements for each room stated/Bluetooth measure
21. Scope responds correctly to PDS requirements i.e. Open Plan areas, Matching, exploratory works
22. Custom items used only when Product Catalog items not available
23. Items missed within the scope
24. Over scoping - Items not required within scope
25. Room quantities adjusted to match the repair
26. Correct products identified as like for like
